Tooltip: This activity edits an existing bucket in the specified folder. If no folder is provided, then it edits the bucket in the current folder.

Arguments.Name: Bucket
Arguments.Tooltip: Bucket edited. Reflects changes on the returned field. You can change any fields in this object before sending to be updated and it will change those values. The New arguments above will override any changes to the object.

Arguments.Name: NewBucketDescription
Arguments.Tooltip: New description for the bucket to be created

Arguments.Name: NewBucketName
Arguments.Tooltip: New name for the bucket to be created

Arguments.Name: Folder
Arguments.Tooltip: Folder to search for buckets. If not specified, uses the current folder that the process is running within.
